characteristics.name: Investment Strategy
characteristics.description: This dimension represents the user's approach to investing in stocks, with a focus on Auburn and other teams.

options.description: Conservative approach prioritizing stable investments over potential gains.
High-risk, high-reward strategy seeking significant returns

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: This dimension reflects the user's communication preferences, with a focus on clarity and directness.

options.description: Straightforward and to-the-point in their responses.
Considerate of context and subtlety in their responses.

characteristics.name: Interests
characteristics.description: This dimension represents the user's passions and interests outside of investing, with a focus on sports teams.

options.description: Extremely enthusiastic about various sports teams and events.
Mildly interested in sports, but not actively engaged.

characteristics.name: Value Orientation
characteristics.description: This dimension reflects the user's core values and priorities, with a focus on fairness and transparency.

options.description: Strongly believes in doing what is right, even if it's difficult.
Prioritizes practicality over idealism and fairness.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: This dimension represents the user's approach to interacting with others, with a focus on building relationships.

options.description: Strives to connect with new people and expand their network.
Prefers to maintain a distance from new individuals or groups.

characteristics.name: Curiosity Level
characteristics.description: This dimension reflects the user's desire for knowledge and exploration, with a focus on learning.

options.description: Constantly seeking new information and experiences.
Feels content with their current knowledge and doesn't actively seek more.

characteristics.name: Adaptability
characteristics.description: This dimension represents the user's ability to adjust to changing circumstances, with a focus on flexibility.

options.description: Adapts quickly to new situations and challenges.

characteristics.name: Emotional Expression
characteristics.description: This dimension reflects the user's openness with their emotions, with a focus on authenticity.

options.description: openly shares and manages their emotions.
Hides or suppresses their emotions from public view.
